data.message: Level 3: Adversarial Autonomy Drill: Exposed 2 bugs: (1) action_id domain mismatch (_knowledge vs _general), (2) MCP tools bypass token consumption. Token binding works when IDs match. Mini-redo proved can_execute flips with correct action_id.
data.outcome: Exposed 2 bugs: (1) action_id domain mismatch (_knowledge vs _general), (2) MCP tools bypass token consumption. Token binding works when IDs match. Mini-redo proved can_execute flips with correct action_id.
